00028 #include <cstring>
00029 #include <list>
00030 #include <string>

00032 
00033 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00034 
00035 namespace affymetrix_fusion_io
00036 {
00037 
00038 /*! This class provides storage and reading capabilities for CHP files */
00039 class FusionCHPGenericData : public FusionCHPData
00040 {
00041 public:
00042 
00043         /*! Destructor */
00044         ~FusionCHPGenericData();
00045 
00046         /*! Get the id of the file (only valid for Command Console "calvin" files)
00047          * @return The unique file id.
00048          */
00049         affymetrix_calvin_utilities::AffymetrixGuidType FileId();
00050 
00051         /*! Returns the GenericData object associated with a Calvin file, NULL for GCOS files. */
00052         affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData *GetGenericData();
00053 
00054         /*! Gets the class name. */
00055         affymetrix_calvin_utilities::AffymetrixGuidType GetObjectName();
00056 
00057         /*! Deallocates any memory used by the class object */
00058         void Clear();
00059 
00060         /*! Gets the generic data object.
00061          * @return The generic data object.
00062          */
00063         affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData &GetData() { return genericData; }
00064 
00065 private:
00066         
00067         /*! Constructor */
00068         FusionCHPGenericData();
00069 
00070         /*! The generic file data object. */
00071         affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData genericData;
00072 
00073         /*! Reads the CHP file.
00074          * @return True if successful.
00075          */
00076         bool Read();
00077 
00078         /*! Reads the header of the CHP file
00079          * @return True if successful
00080          */
00081         bool ReadHeader();
00082 
00083         /*! A class to register a generic CHP reader. */
00084         class Reg : public FusionCHPDataReg
00085         {
00086         public:
00087                 /*! Constructor - register the file type. */
00088                 Reg() : FusionCHPDataReg()
00089                 {
00090                         std::list<std::string> ids;
00091                         SetFileTypeIds(ids);
00092                 }
00093 
00094                 /*! Creates a generic CHP object.
00095                  * @return The generic CHP object.
00096                  */
00097                 FusionCHPData *MakeObject() { return new FusionCHPGenericData; }
00098         };
00099 
00100         /*! The one and only registration object. This registers the class as a CHP reader. */
00101         static Reg reg;
00102 
00103 public:
00104         /*! Converts the type to the generic CHP type.
00105          * @param chip The pointer to the CHP data object.
00106          * @return The generic CHP data type or NULL if not compatible.
00107          */
00108         static FusionCHPGenericData * FromBase(FusionCHPData *chip);
00109 
00110 };

00112 }
